articles.title: Strait of Hormuz is in focus as Israel-Hamas war threatens to spread - CNBC
articles.description: One important area that market observers are keeping a close eye on is for potential impact on the world's most important oil transit chokepoint — the Strait of Hormuz.
articles.content:
Tankers depicted in the Strait of Hormuz a strategically important waterway which separates Iran, Oman and the United Arab Emirates.
